functions.name: getAllPosts
functions.description: Retrieve all blog posts from the repository with metadata and content

useCache.description: Use cached data if available to improve performance

forceRefresh.description: Force refresh from R2 storage even if cached data exists

functions.name: getPostBySlug
functions.description: Get a specific blog post by its URL slug identifier

slug.description: URL-friendly identifier for the specific post to retrieve

functions.name: getPostByHash
functions.description: Get a specific blog post by its unique hash identifier

hash.description: Unique hash identifier for the specific post to retrieve

functions.name: getPostByPath
functions.description: Get a specific blog post by its file path in the repository

path.description: File path within the repository to retrieve

functions.name: getRecentPosts
functions.description: Get the most recent blog posts sorted by date

count.description: Number of recent posts to return (default: 3)

functions.name: getPostsSimilarityByHashes
functions.description: Calculate similarity score between two specific posts using their hash identifiers

hash1.description: Hash of the first post to compare

hash2.description: Hash of the second post to compare

functions.name: getSimilarPostsHashByHash
functions.description: Get list of similar post hashes for a given post using AI similarity matching

hash.description: Hash of the reference post to find similar content for

limit.description: Maximum number of similar post hashes to return

functions.name: getSimilarPostsByHash
functions.description: Find posts similar to the given post using AI embeddings, returns full post objects

hash.description: Hash of the reference post to find similar content for

count.description: Number of similar posts to return with full metadata

options.description: Additional options for similarity calculation and filtering

functions.name: getSimilarPostsBySlug
functions.description: Find posts similar to the given post using AI embeddings and semantic analysis

slug.description: Slug of the reference post to find similar content for

count.description: Number of similar posts to return

functions.name: getPostsEmbeddings
functions.description: Get AI vector embeddings for all posts used in similarity calculations

useCache.description: Use cached embedding data if available for better performance

functions.name: getPostsSimilarity
functions.description: Get the complete similarity matrix showing relationships between all posts

useCache.description: Use cached similarity data if available for better performance

functions.name: getTopSimilarPostsHashes
functions.description: Get the most similar post pairs from the entire collection

useCache.description: Use cached similarity data if available for better performance

functions.name: getSimilarPostsSlugBySlug
functions.description: Get list of similar post slugs for a given post using AI similarity matching

slug.description: Slug of the reference post to find similar content for

limit.description: Maximum number of similar post slugs to return

functions.name: getR2MediaUrl
functions.description: Generate optimized URL for media files with automatic format conversion

path.description: Media file path to generate optimized URL for

functions.name: getAllMedia
functions.description: Retrieve all media files with metadata and optimized URLs

useCache.description: Use cached media data if available

functions.name: getAllMedias
functions.description: Retrieve all media files with metadata (deprecated alias for getAllMedia)

useCache.description: Use cached media data if available for better performance

functions.name: getMediaItems
functions.description: Get media items with formatted URLs and metadata for display

useCache.description: Use cached media data if available for better performance

functions.name: getMediaEmbeddings
functions.description: Get AI vector embeddings for all media files used in similarity calculations

useCache.description: Use cached embedding data if available for better performance

functions.name: getMediaSimilarity
functions.description: Get the complete similarity matrix showing relationships between all media files

useCache.description: Use cached similarity data if available for better performance

functions.name: getMediaSimilarityByHashes
functions.description: Calculate similarity score between two specific media files using their hash identifiers

hash1.description: Hash of the first media file to compare

hash2.description: Hash of the second media file to compare

functions.name: getTopSimilarMediaHashes
functions.description: Get the most similar media file pairs from the entire collection

useCache.description: Use cached similarity data if available for better performance

functions.name: getSimilarMediaHashByHash
functions.description: Get list of similar media file hashes for a given media file using AI similarity matching

hash.description: Hash of the reference media file to find similar content for

limit.description: Maximum number of similar media hashes to return

functions.name: getSimilarMediaByHash
functions.description: Find media files similar to the given media file using AI embeddings, returns full media objects

hash.description: Hash of the reference media file to find similar content for

count.description: Number of similar media files to return with full metadata

functions.name: handleCloudflareRequest
functions.description: Handle Cloudflare media transformation requests for optimized image delivery

request.description: Cloudflare request object containing transformation parameters

functions.name: getSourceFilesList
functions.description: Get list of all source files in the repository before build processing

useCache.description: Use cached file list if available for better performance

functions.name: getDistFilesList
functions.description: Get list of all built/distribution files after processing

useCache.description: Use cached file list if available for better performance

functions.name: getFileContent
functions.description: Read the content of a specific file from the repository

path.description: File path within the repository to read content from

useCache.description: Use cached file content if available for better performance

functions.name: getGraph
functions.description: Get the project dependency graph showing relationships between files and components

useCache.description: Use cached graph data if available for better performance

functions.name: getR2Url
functions.description: Generate R2 storage URL for accessing repository files with automatic revision resolution

path.description: File path within the repository (optional, defaults to root)

functions.name: getR2ProjectUrl
functions.description: Generate project-specific R2 URL for accessing project-level resources

path.description: File path within the project folder (optional, defaults to root)

functions.name: getR2SharedFolderUrl
functions.description: Generate R2 URL for shared folder resources accessible across projects

path.description: File path within the shared folder (optional, defaults to root)

functions.name: getR2RevUrl
functions.description: Generate revision-specific R2 URL for accessing repository files (alias for getR2Url)

path.description: File path within the repository (optional, defaults to root)

functions.name: createViteProxy
functions.description: Create Vite development server proxy configuration for local development

folder.description: Repository folder name for Vite proxy configuration

functions.name: getSqliteUrl
functions.description: Get URL for the SQLite database containing repository metadata and search indices

useCache.description: Use cached URL if available for better performance

functions.name: fetchPublicApi
functions.description: Fetch data from public API endpoints with automatic error handling and retries

path.description: API endpoint path to fetch from (defaults to root)

functions.name: fetchProjectDetails
functions.description: Get detailed project information including metadata, configuration, and settings

useCache.description: Use cached project details if available for better performance

functions.name: fetchR2Json
functions.description: Fetch JSON data from R2 storage with automatic revision resolution and error handling

path.description: File path in R2 storage to fetch JSON data from

opts.description: Additional fetch options like caching, headers, and timeouts

functions.name: fetchJson
functions.description: Fetch JSON data from any URL with error handling and optional caching

url.description: Complete URL to fetch JSON data from

opts.description: Additional fetch options like headers, timeout, and caching

functions.name: getActiveProjectRev
functions.description: Get the active revision ID for the project with optional caching and detail control

forceRefresh.description: Force refresh from API even if cached revision exists

skipDetails.description: Skip fetching detailed project information for faster response

functions.name: fetchProjectActiveRev
functions.description: Fetch the current active revision ID for the project from the API

forceRefresh.description: Force refresh from API even if cached revision exists

functions.name: handleOpenAiRequest
functions.description: Process OpenAI function calling requests with RepoMD context and tools

request.description: OpenAI API request object containing function calls and context

options.description: Additional options for OpenAI request processing

functions.name: createOpenAiToolHandler
functions.description: Create a handler for OpenAI function calling that provides access to RepoMD methods

options.description: Configuration options for the OpenAI tool handler

functions.name: getClientStats
functions.description: Get performance statistics and usage metrics for the RepoMD client instance

functions.name: sortPostsByDate
functions.description: Sort an array of posts by their publication date (newest first)

posts.description: Array of post objects to sort by date

functions.name: getReleaseInfo
functions.description: Get release information and version details for the current project

useCache.description: Use cached release information if available for better performance

functions.name: getProjectMetadata
functions.description: Get comprehensive project metadata including configuration, settings, and build information

useCache.description: Use cached project metadata if available for better performance

functions.name: ensureLatestRev
functions.description: Ensure the latest revision is resolved and cached for subsequent operations

functions.name: destroy
functions.description: Clean up RepoMD instance resources, clear caches, and abort pending operations

functions.name: getPostsBySlug
functions.description: Get a blog post by its slug (alias for getPostBySlug for backward compatibility)

slug.description: URL-friendly slug identifier for the post to retrieve

functions.name: getSourceFiles
functions.description: Get list of source files in the repository (alias for getSourceFilesList)

useCache.description: Use cached file list if available for better performance

functions.name: getOpenAiToolSpec
functions.description: Get OpenAI tool specification with optional filtering for project-specific configurations

blacklistedTools.description: Array of function names to exclude from the tool specification
